topics.body:
MSF2 has an absolutely stunning soundtrack and the gameplay looks both simple and interesting at the same time

While Shantae and the Pirate's Curse actually reminds me a bit of Super Mario World at times when looking at the gameplay, and that's absolutely a good thing. I'll get back to you on the soundtrack, but I know I'm already in love with "one track in the game":https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fFDhn4wgwKk
topics.author: 9ba2e84e636164642cc03200

topics.body:
"@EHAN":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/559d759f63687263b0000757#post_559d759f63687263b0000757
Oh yeah, way forward games are always going to have good sound tracks

Also the gameplay of shantae is usually more along the lines of a combination of a Metroid world design but with yoshi's island style platforming
